org.tsugi

Interface Result

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseResult

    public interface Result
    The data structure for an LTI result. Tsugi insures that this always exists with a local persisted a grade even if the server that launched us has no way of taking grades back from us. This allows Tsugi tools to manage grades regardless of the LMS they are launched from.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getComment()
      Current comment for the resource link
      Double getGrade()
      Current grade for the resource link
      Long getId()
      The integer primary key for this result within this Tsugi instance
      Launch getLaunch()
      Get the launch associated with this object
      Service getService()
      The Service associated with this result (LTI 1.x)
      String getSourceDID()
      The SourceDID associated with this result (LTI 1.x)
      String getURL()
      The result URL (LTI 2.x) for this result.

    • Method Detail

      • getLaunch

        Get the launch associated with this object

      • getId

        Long getId()

      • getComment

        String getComment()
        Current comment for the resource link

      • getURL

        String getURL()
        The result URL (LTI 2.x) for this result. May be null.
        Returns:
        String This is either the fully-qualified resource URL or null if there is no LTI 2.x resource URL available for the launch.

      • getSourceDID

        String getSourceDID()
        The SourceDID associated with this result (LTI 1.x)
        Returns:
        String This is either the LTI 1.x SourceDID or null.

      • getService

        Service getService()
        The Service associated with this result (LTI 1.x)
        Returns:
        Service This is either the LTI 1.x Result service or null.
